--- title: Tracking callbacks keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Callbacks that make decisions depending how a monitored metric/loss behaves" description: "Callbacks that make decisions depending how a monitored metric/loss behaves" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ShortEpochCallback[source]

ShortEpochCallback(pct=0.01, short_valid=True) :: Callback

Fit just pct of an epoch, then stop

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = synth_learner()
learn.fit(1, cbs=ShortEpochCallback())
epoch train_loss valid_loss time
0 00:00
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = synth_learner()
learn.fit(1, cbs=ShortEpochCallback(short_valid=False))
epoch train_loss valid_loss time
0 12.680832 00:00
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class GradientAccumulation[source]

GradientAccumulation(n_acc=32) :: Callback

Accumulate gradients before updating weights

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = synth_learner()

learn.fit(2, lr=0.01, cbs=GradientAccumulation(n_acc=2*learn.dls.bs))
# ensure train_loss decreased
assert learn.recorder.values[-1][0] < learn.recorder.values[0][0]

learn.fit(2, lr=0.01, cbs=GradientAccumulation(n_acc=1e6))
# ensure valid_loss didn't change (same weights)
assert learn.recorder.values[-1][1] == learn.recorder.values[0][1]
epoch train_loss valid_loss time
0 14.479012 6.487211 00:00
1 7.784875 0.214303 00:00
epoch train_loss valid_loss time
0 0.224275 0.214303 00:00
1 0.224200 0.214303 00:00
{% endraw %}
